display_long_description:
There are no allies.

There is no place to return to.

All that exists are countless enemies and a single invisible sword.

If acceptance means death, then there is only one way to survive.

'Reject everything.'

■ Overview
"The Shinsoku Grand Swordmaster" is a VR action game focused on swordsmanship and defense, where you confront long-range attacks from countless enemies using only your sword.
As the "Grand Swordmaster," your goal is to deflect all attacks with precise and swift swordplay, striving to survive without harming anyone!

The swords wielded by the "Grand Swordmaster" have varying power depending on factors such as the direction of the blade, the force of the swing, and the quick draw.
If the power of your sword doesn't surpass that of your enemy's attack, your sword will break.
Furthermore, swords degrade over time and with missed swings, so precise swordsmanship without waste is essential.

Experience authentic swordplay action beyond mere swinging!

■ Avatar Customization Function
If you have an avatar in VRM format, you can change the player's appearance.
Use your favorite avatar to enjoy the replay footage!

To change the avatar, you need to connect your PC and VR device.
Place the VRM file named "avatar.vrm" in the "Android/data/jp.co.fox_hound.the_shinsoku_grand_swordmaster" folder on your VR device, and make sure that the avatar appears in the in-game settings screen.
